message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers incredible value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product is worth more than that to me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet you halfway at $13,000. I would like to propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
